examples: Some people tried to stop the fight but I didn't want to get involved.
Algunas personas intentaron detener la pelea pero yo no quería involucrarme.
It can be helpful to talk about your worries to someone who is not directly involved.
Puede ser útil hablar sobre sus preocupaciones con alguien que no esté involucrado directamente.
He became actively involved in politics.
Se involucró activamente en la política.
How many vehicles were involved in the crash?
¿Cuántos vehículos estuvieron involucrados en el accidente?
